tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE adverse_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    event_description TEXT,
    reported_by VARCHAR(50),
    report_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE events (
  event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  event_date DATE NOT NULL,
  patient_id INT NOT NULL,
  reported_by VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE event_details (
  detail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT NOT NULL,
  detail_description TEXT NOT NULL,
  severity VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES events(event_id)
);

CREATE TABLE event_reports (
  report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  event_id INT NOT NULL,
  agency_id INT NOT NULL,
  report_date DATE NOT NULL,
  report_description TEXT NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (event_id) REFERENCES events(event_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (agency_id) REFERENCES agencies(agency_id)
);

CREATE TABLE AdverseEvents (
	adverse_event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_id INT,
	event_date DATE,
	severity VARCHAR(50),
	reported_by VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE Patients (
	patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	first_name VARCHAR(50),
	last_name VARCHAR(50),
	date_of_birth DATE,
	gender CHAR(1),
	address VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE HealthcareProviders (
	healthcare_provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	provider_name VARCHAR(100),
	specialty VARCHAR(50),
	location VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE AdverseEventReports (
	report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	adverse_event_id INT,
	patient_id INT,
	report_date DATE,
	reporter VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE RegulatoryAgencies (
	agency_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	agency_name VARCHAR(100),
	location VARCHAR(100),
	contact_person VARCHAR(100)
)
